title: transfer is down
body: when can i transfer regions again? been waiting for a while, still not up.

replies.body: We're still working on getting those transfers up and running again, and HollyMonster has been delivering updates as soon as we get them [**over in this post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)!

How u dare saying "has been delivering updates" when only 1 message 3 weeks ago was posted and nothing new ever since?
Are you trolling or helping?... stop your BS comments, you are useless to the forum

I get that you're frustrated, heck it's been frustrating for myself a bit as well. I know there haven't been any updates in there recently, but that's just because there *aren't* any new updates to give. When new info does arise, that's the first place it's gonna go though for sure. 

The latest info that's come out was "our engineers estimate it will take at least 5 to 6 weeks to be fixed", so it likely won't be until early next year.

I know that... but the expression "has been delivering updates" implies a continuation on the activity of informing us, that's distorting the reality (or lying) to create the ilusion of Riot attempting to solve the issue now. Clearly that's not the case. They are working on other "issues" (better not go into this) and not paying attention to this problem.
